message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value is worth at least $12000 to me.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. That's the most I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $12000 to the right buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from being comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $12500 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $13000. This is a very competitive price, considering the product's value to me. I'm confident you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $12800 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $12900. This is a very close to your target price, and I'm confident you'll find it's a great deal. I'm not willing to go any lower, though.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit away from my target price. I'm willing to pay up to $12700 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm willing to make one more adjustment, Bob. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $12800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident it's still a great deal for you. I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, Alice. I'm willing to pay up to $12500 for the product. I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me at that price?
